alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 11:59AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT DAKOTA...EASTERN SCOTT... NORTHWESTERN GOODHUE...NORTHERN RICE...SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHWESTERN PIERCE COUNTIES... At 1157 AM CST, a band of heavy snow was located from Cottage Grove to New Prague, moving southeast at 50 mph. Visibilities around 1/4 mile or less are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Faribault, Northfield, Red Wing, Eagan, Woodbury, Burnsville, Lakeville, Apple Valley, Shakopee, Cottage Grove, Inver Grove Heights and Savage.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if you must travel through this snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location.
